title: Game of Thrones
description: Set on a fictional continent of Westeros, this fantasy drama explores the deadly political and family struggles between noble houses.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned meth kingpin. Gritty, raw, and a masterclass in storytelling.

title: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids battle supernatural forces and government secrets in this nostalgic sci-fi thriller.

title: Peaky Blinders
description: Post-WWI Birmingham gangster drama featuring razor-sharp style and even sharper storytelling.

title: The Mandalorian
description: A lone bounty hunter in the Star Wars universe protects a mysterious Force-sensitive child known as Grogu.

title: Sherlock
description: A modern update on Sherlock Holmes solving twisted crimes with razor-sharp intellect and sass.

title: The Witcher
description: Mutant monster-hunter Geralt battles dark magic, politics, and destiny in a fantasy world filled with danger.

title: Dark
description: A mind-bending German sci-fi series where time travel weaves a chilling and complex narrative.
